dialogueLines.line: Did I really lose to that old man..?
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: I won against that blue hairball.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Uh, what do plan to do now?
dialogueLines.speaker: gf

dialogueLines.line: To be honest, I didn't expect to get this far.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: [What a lovely specimen you are. Why don't I take you in for a closer examination?]
